entry.title: Hacking Corruption 2012 Explained By Michael Lenczner
entry.summary:
Description

Montreal, Oct. 22, 2012 - Michael Lenczner, co-founder of Montreal Ouvert and CEO of Ajah, explained what the Hacking Corruption 2012 hackathon is all about.

This short video was recorded live at the Montreal Python monthly event MP32 with a little help from Savoir-faire Linux.

Useful links:

  • Hackathon: http://quebecouvert.org/events/hackonslacorruption/
  • Montreal Ouvert: http://montrealouvert.net/
  • Ajah fundtracker: http://ajah.ca
  • MP32: http://montrealpython.org/2012/10/mp32/
  • Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
  • Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
